section.p: Set of times for defined events in the EMS trip

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11417 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.10"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11641)/@code="67667-6" EMS Times Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10820)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Times Section" (CONF:10822)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10821)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11053)
Conforms to Call Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.38:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11055)
Conforms to Unit Notified Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.39:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11057)
Conforms to Unit En Route Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.40:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11059)
Conforms to Unit On Scene Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.41:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11061)
Conforms to Unit At Patient Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.42:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11063)
Conforms to Unit Left Scene Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.43:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11065)
Conforms to Patient Arrived At Destination Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.44:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11067)
Conforms to Unit Back In Service Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.45:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:11069)
Conforms to Dispatch Notified Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.46:2022-01-01)

Conforms to Call Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.38:2022-01-01)
